<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17037](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17037.html) (Testschains: Many regtests with different g
This means that non std txs aren't propagated on testnet, so tend to NACK
Well, only if users don't set acceptnonstdtxn=1, we could say it in the release notes.\nBut yeah, that's, I think, the best argument against this.\n
It makes sense to default to `-acceptnonstdtxn=1` on testnet. But it's also just testnet, so don't care too strongly.
Closing for now due to lack of interest.\n
